meanings.sent1: The clown's antics were funnier than expected.
meanings.sent2: The movie was funnier than I thought it would be.
meanings.sent3: The silly dog chasing its tail was even funnier than the clown.
meanings.sent4: Her jokes were so funny, they made the room even funnier.
meanings.sent5: The comedian's performance was so funnier that everyone was in stitches.

meanings.sent1: The funny video was even funnier than the one before.
meanings.sent2: His jokes are always funnier when told in person.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt to catch a laser pointer was funnier than expected.
meanings.sent4: The situation was so awkward, it became even funnier with time.
meanings.sent5: The children's play was so funnier that the audience couldn't stop laughing.

meanings.sent1: His stories always seem funnier than mine.
meanings.sent2: The sequel to the movie was funnier than the original.
meanings.sent3: The exaggerated retelling of the event was even funnier than the actual experience.
meanings.sent4: Her witty comebacks were so sharp, they cut through the tension and made the situation even funnier.
meanings.sent5: The parody of the famous scene was so funnier that it became a viral sensation.
